description:
Sanji and Vergo slug it out in a cloud of toxic gas, Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar`s reign of terror to a brutal end!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fierce Battle Gets Heated! Luffy vs. Caesar!
Hakunetsu no Gekisen: Luffy VS Caesar
La fièvre du combat. Luffy contre César !
Una pelea incandescente. Luffy VS Caesar
白熱の激戦 ルフィVSシーザー
